ui.name: User Interface
ui.text: Add more UI components to your screens or organising them adding components such as HorizontalArrangement

scr.name: Screens
scr.text: Add more screens to your application and make sure they have visual components

naming.name: Naming
naming.text: Change the default name of some of the components, procedures or variables that make up the application

conditional.name: Conditionals
conditional.text: Add more "if-then" blocks, there are too few "if-then" conditional blocks in your application

events.name: Events
events.text: Add more event type blocks to your application

loop.name: Loops
loop.text: Use loop blocks such as "for each" instead of "while". Using "for each" loops gives you more control over the iterations

proc.name: Procedural Abstraction
proc.text: Increase the use of the procedural blocks you have created in the application or think about creating new ones. Procedures are very useful to avoid repeating sets of blocks

lists.name: Lists
lists.text: Improve the "list" blocks you have in the application. Use lists that contain other lists to organise and access information using the "look up in pairs" block

dp.name: Data Persistance
dp.text: Use the TinyWebDB or FireBaseDB component to store your application data

sensors.name: Sensors
sensors.text: Add more sensor-type components to your application. It is recommended that the application has at least two sensor-type components

media.name: Media
media.text: Add more media-type components to your application. It is recommended that the application has at least two media-type components

social.name: Social
social.text: Add more social-type components to your application. It is recommended that the application has at least two social-type components

connect.name: Connectivity
connect.text: Add a bluetooth or web component to improve the connectivity of your application

draw.name: Drawing and Animation
draw.text: Add the "canvas", "ball" and "interactive image" components to the application to improve the application

operator.name: Math and Logic Operations
operator.text: Add more "logic" or "math" blocks to your application

card.title: The score obtained for your project is: {{evaluation}}
card.subtitle: To improve your project you should enhance the following areas
card.more_info: Do you need more information about {{field}} click here
card.improve: Click here to know how to improve {{field}}

time_btw_steps.short: How quickly you have completed the step, I see that you have understood it perfectly, let's see what else you have to do||Congratulations, you have completed this step really fast, let's go to the next one||Wow, if you keep completing the steps at this pace I will ask for your advice, let's go to the next step
time_btw_steps.medium: It looks like you had no problem completing the step, let's see what's next||You have understood the instructions of the previous step well, pay attention to the next||Step completed successfully, let's see what's next you should do
time_btw_steps.long: This step seems to have cost you a little more, if you have doubts you can ask me||Taking time to complete a step is not a bad thing, remember that we are learning. Remember that, if there is something that you are not clear how to do it you can ask me||Well it seems that this step was a little more difficult to complete. Lots of encouragement with the next one!

face_expression.sad: Take as much time as you need to complete the steps, you are learning
face_expression.surprised: Developing an application so easily is surprising, isn't it?
face_expression.disgusted: Take as much time as you need to complete the steps, you are learning
face_expression.angry: It is normal that you may be angry for not understanding how to complete the step, ask me if you have any doubt
face_expression.happy: I see you are quite happy, I am glad to see that you like that we are doing the project together
face_expression.fearful: Take as much time as you need to complete the steps, you are learning
face_expression.neutral: You are quite focused on the guided project, keep it up!

projects_guided.DELETE_COMPONENT: Do you want to know how to remove a component from your project? Click here

projects_guided.DELETE_BLOCK: Do you want to know how to delete a block from your project? Click here

projects_guided.DELETE_BLOCK_NEXT: Do you want to know how to delete a block that is next to another block? Click here
projects_guided.ADD_BLOCK_VALUE: Do you want to know how to add the value of a block? Click here
projects_guided.DELETE_BLOCK_VALUE: Do you want to know how to delete the value of a block? Click here
projects_guided.ADD_BLOCK_STATEMENT: Do you want to know how to add a block within an existing block? Click here
projects_guided.DELETE_BLOCK_STATEMENT: Do you want to know how to remove a block that is within another block? Click here

holamundo.name: Hola mundo
holamundo.text: The objective of this project is to become familiar with the appinventor platform environment. The final result is an app that displays on the screen a text with the image of the University of Cadiz

latigo.name: Latigo
latigo.text: The aim of this project is to become familiar with the appinventor platform environment. The final result is an app that plays a sound when the smartphone is shaken

hellopurr.name: Hello Purr
hellopurr.text: The purpose of this project is to become familiar with the Appinventor platform environment. The final result is an app that vibrates and plays a meow when clicking on the image of a cat

traductor.name: Traductor
traductor.text: The purpose of this project is to learn about concepts beyond the basics. The final result is an app that translates from Spanish to English using speech recognition.

projects_guided.start: Click here to start the project

started.title: Project {{project}} loaded!
started.subtitle: I will be guiding you in design space and blocks on what instructions to follow, stay alert!!. If at any time you want to discontinue the guided project, let me know and I will not give you any further instructions
started.resources: Click here to download the project resources
started.resources_help: Don't know how to upload resources? Click here
started.show_steps: If you have already uploaded the resources, click here to start showing the steps to follow

ended.title: Congratulations, you have completed the guided project {{project}}
ended.subtitle: You have completed the guided project. You can continue with the guided project activated, but I will still give you instructions if you change any element of the project. If you want to deactivate the guided project click the button below

projects_guided.end: Click here if you want to deactivate the guided project
projects_guided.test: Do you want to try the application? Click here and i will explain you how to do it
projects_guided.title: Guided projects
projects_guided.subtitle: Below you can see a list of available guided projects, you can consult information about them and select one so that we can start doing it together

language.subtitle: To change the language, select the language of your choice from those listed below
language.title: Change the NAVI language

features.title: Features of NAVI
features.subtitle: My creators have programmed me to help you with all the things shown below. If you ever want to see this listing again, ask me to tell you what my features are. For example, typing: "What can you do for me?"

1.title: 1. Evaluate your project at any time to see where you need to improve
1.text: You can get an evaluation of your project at any time, just ask me. In the result of the evaluation you will get an overall grade of the project and you will know where you need to improve and how you can do it. For example, typing: "Can you evaluate my project?"

2.title: 2. Solve the problems you have while developing your project
2.text: If you have any problem during the development of the project, you can tell me and I will tell you how to solve it. For example, typing: "NAVI, I can't install the application on my mobile"

3.title: 3. Help you to improve a particular aspect of your project
3.text: You can ask me how to improve a particular aspect of your project. I still haven't learned much in this area and I will always give you the same advice. For example, typing: "How can I improve the user interface?"

4.title: 4. Make together a step by step guided project for you to learn how to use the platform
4.text: We can learn together thanks to guided projects. We will develop together a project from scratch step by step, where we will first design our application and then we will give it the logic thanks to the blocks. For example, typing: "NAVI I want to do a guided project"

5.title: 5. Resolve any doubts you may have when you are developing your project
5.text: If you have any questions about any of the elements of the platform, just ask me and I will try to solve all your doubts. For example, you can ask me: "What is a component?", "How do I add a file to the project?" or "How can I test my application?"

6.title: 6. Change the language in which we communicate
6.text: If you want to change the language just ask me. For example, typing: "I want to change language". Currently only English and Spanish are spoken, but I am making an effort to learn new languages. I recommend that we communicate in the same language as you have the platform, so we can understand each other better
